title: PlayerMint: Community Access NFTs
description: The vast majority of creators in the gaming space do not have effective means of monetizing their communities without advertising to them.
solution: Provide gaming content creators and their fans a way to mutually benefit off one another through NFTs that provide community access.
experience: Our team has a combined 45 years of experience in gaming and 10 years in blockchain. We were successful in Fund4 of Project Catalyst.
